message.name: TARGET_POSITION_NED
message.description: This message encodes the position of a target object
message.field: X Position in NED frame in meters
Y Position in NED frame in meters
Z Position in NED frame in meters
X velocity in NED frame in meter / s
Y velocity in NED frame in meter / s
Z velocity in NED frame in meter / s
